txt.en: Search Gazathrug's outpost for signs of the Orc Captain
Read the orders
Read the orders
Lieutenants of Gazathrug can be found in the southern part of Máttugard.\n\nYou should defeat Gazathrug's Lieutenants and retrieve their orders.
Read the orders
The Orc outpost has been abandoned
Retrieve the first lieutenant's orders
Gazathrug's outpost can be found in the southern part of Máttugard.\n\nYou should search Gazathrug's outpost for signs of the Orc Captain.
The Hunt For Gazathrug
Defeated the lieutenant and retrieved the Orc's orders

'I have been looking over the Orc-orders we collected again. I cannot believe I missed this before! Look, it is crude and difficult to read, but each order is signed by someone named Gazathrug. Most likely this Gazathrug is an Orc and probably commands the Orcs here in Máttugard!\n\n'We did not see Gazathrug at Tholmuzog, but he must have lieutenants nearby. We should seek out Gazathrug's Lieutenants and find out where hides their commander. Perhaps we can capture Gazathrug and learn what plans or schemes the Orcs of Deepscrave have made for us!'
'This is certainly Gazathrug's outpost... but no one is here! There are dead Orcs scattered about as well! Did another dwarf get here before us?'
Talk to Hetbrúda at Gazathrug's outpost
Defeated the lieutenant and retrieved the Orc's orders
Hetbrúda searches for Gazathrug, the captain of the upper reaches of Máttugard.
Gazathrug's outpost can be found in the southern part of Máttugard.\n\nYou should talk to Hetbrúda at Gazathrug's outpost.
Defeated the lieutenant and retrieved the Orc's orders
Retrieve the second lieutenant's orders
Retrieve the third lieutenant's orders
You should read Gazathrug's orders to his lieutenants.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Note: The orders can be found in your inventory.</rgb>
